name: Notion Wedding Planner Template
description: Looking for a wedding planner to keep all your special day details in order? Look no further! This notion wedding planner is the perfect solution to help you stay organized while planning the perfect wedding.This wedding planner is designed to help you keep track of all important information such as guest lists, vendor contacts, to-do lists, and more. It features easy-to-use templates for budgets, vendor comparisons, seating charts, and more.PAGES INCLUDED:Wedding task listWedding categoriesWedd
features: Wedding task list; Wedding categories; Wedding budget & expenses tracker; Vendors lists; Vision boards; Seating plan; Wedding day schedule; Honeymoon Planner

enhancedContent.overview: The Notion Wedding Planner Template provides engaged couples with a comprehensive digital workspace to organize every aspect of their special day. From tracking budgets and managing vendor relationships to creating seating charts and planning honeymoons, this template serves as your central command center for wedding planning. Instead of juggling spreadsheets, paper planners, and scattered notes, you'll have one beautiful, organized Notion workspace where you and your partner can collaborate on bringing your dream wedding to life while staying on top of timelines and budgets.

features: Comprehensive wedding task list with deadlines
Timeline tracking from engagement to big day
Detailed budget tracker for all wedding expenses
Payment status and vendor invoice management
Notes and ratings for vendor evaluation
Guest list management with RSVP tracking
Seating chart planner and table assignments
Vision board for design inspiration and mood boarding

problemsSolved: Overwhelming stress from managing hundreds of wedding details across multiple tools, notebooks, and spreadsheets
Budget overruns due to lack of centralized expense tracking and unclear spending visibility
Missed deadlines and forgotten tasks because timelines and to-dos are scattered and not systematically tracked
Poor coordination between partners and vendors causing miscommunication and planning conflicts
solutionsBenefits: Centralizes all wedding planning in one Notion workspace, eliminating scattered information and providing peace of mind
Prevents budget surprises with real-time expense tracking that shows exactly how much you've spent versus your budget
Ensures nothing falls through the cracks with comprehensive task lists, deadlines, and automated progress tracking
Facilitates collaboration between partners with shared access allowing both to contribute, update, and stay aligned on planning
idealFor: Engaged couples planning their wedding who want to stay organized throughout the entire process
DIY wedding planners coordinating multiple vendors and details without professional planning services
Organized couples who prefer digital planning over traditional paper wedding planners
Partners planning together who need a shared workspace to collaborate on wedding decisions
Budget-conscious couples who want to track every expense and avoid overspending
notRecommendedFor: Couples working with full-service wedding planners who manage all details in their own systems
People preferring traditional paper planners or those not comfortable with digital tools

faqs.question: How do I get started with this template?
faqs.answer: After duplicating the template, start by setting your wedding date and overall budget. Then add your initial vendor contacts and begin populating the task list with deadlines. Share the Notion page with your partner so you can both contribute. Work through each section systematically, starting with high-priority tasks like venue and caterer selection.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: The template includes a comprehensive wedding task list organized by category, budget and expense tracker, vendor management database with comparison tools, guest list with RSVP tracking, seating chart planner, wedding day schedule timeline, vision board for inspiration, and honeymoon planning section. All integrated in one Notion workspace.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully customizable. You can add custom task categories, modify budget categories to match your spending, add vendor types specific to your wedding, create custom fields for guest tracking (dietary restrictions, gift tracking, etc.), and personalize the vision board with your own aesthetic preferences.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases?
faqs.answer: Primary use cases include managing the entire wedding planning process from engagement to big day, tracking wedding budget and expenses across all categories, coordinating with vendors and managing contracts and payments, organizing guest lists and seating arrangements, planning the wedding day timeline down to the minute, and organizing honeymoon travel and logistics.
